De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital y también su familia podrá tener mejores ingresos para progresar económicamente y tener en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge is married and has 3 children aged 3, 11, and 15 years old. In order to generate income for his household, he sells the milk from the cows he has at his farm. 

Thanks to this business, he has succeeded in getting his children ahead and giving them a good quality of life with better economic opportunities for advancement. His biggest dream is to be able to provide a quality education for his children. This is why he works hard in his business, so much so that customer orders have increased considerably and he does not have the capacity to respond to all of them. 

This is why he wants a loan, to buy two dairy cows and thereby respond to all customer orders and keep growing his business. Doing so, he will overcome the difficulty of capital and, at the same time, his family will have more income to achieve financial progress and to have a better quality of life at home.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to be able to meet all his customer orders and to keep growing his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a chicken shed and to buy more chickens and feed for her business.

loans.name: Boris Jose

texts.es:
Boris es una persona muy trabajadora que es esfuerza diariamente por brindar en su familia una buena calidad de vida, sin embargo ha tenido que verse enfrentado a grandes adversidades en su vida que debe superar con gran fortaleza. Boris es aserrador y se dedica a la venta de madera, y desde hace unos días unos ladrones se entraron en su casa y robaron su motosierra, la herramienta de trabajo que es indispensable para su actividad, por tanto lleva unos días en búsqueda de ingresos por otros medios pero no ha logrado generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar. Es por esto que Boris busca un préstamo para comprar una motosierra y continuar con su actividad.

Su mayor sueño es tener un buen negocio que le permita sacar su familia adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Boris is a woodcutter and sells timber for a living. He is a very hardworking person, who strives daily to provide his family with a good quality of life. Nevertheless, he has faced many hardships in his life, through which he must persevere to overcome.  

A few days ago, some thieves broke into his house and stole his chainsaw, an indispensable tool for his line of work. As a result, he's been searching for other sources of income in the past few days but hasn't been able to generate enough money for the household. For this reason, Boris is seeking a loan, which will help him purchase a chainsaw and continue with his business. 

His biggest dream is to have a good business that will allow him to get his family ahead, and have a better quality of life with improved economic opportunities to continue moving forward.

loans.use: to purchase a chainsaw and continue with his business.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Luis tiene una experiencia de 15 años en la venta de verduras y legumbres, y gracias a esto ha logrado tener muy buenos clientes y seguirse posicionando cada vez más en el sector. Con este negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia brindándoles una buena calidad de vida y por esto siempre se esfuerza para que su negocio siga creciendo cada vez más. Desde hace un tiempo se vio en la obligación de dejar el local donde tenía ubicada su tienda, y consiguió ubicarse en un espacio dentro de una carnicería, lo que le ha permitido tener mayor visita de clientes que cuando pasan por la carnicería también compran sus verduras y legumbres en su tienda. Es por esto que requiere un préstamo para comprar verduras y legumbres para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es sacar adelante su negocio y que este le permita brindarles a sus hijos y su esposa una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica en el hogar.
texts.en:
Luis has 15 years of experience in the sale of vegetables and legumes. Thanks to this he has successfully gained very good customers and he continues to grow within his sector. He has managed to get his family ahead and give them a good quality of life with this business. He works hard so that his business will continue to grow more and more. 

A while ago, he was obligated to leave the place where his store was located, and he managed to relocate to a space inside of a butcher's shop. This has allowed him to have more customer visits, as when they go to the butcher's shop, they also buy their vegetables and legumes inside his store. This is why he needs a loan to buy vegetables and legumes to satisfy his customers' demand. 

His biggest dream is to move his business forward, and that this will allow him to give his children and wife a good quality of life and better economic stability at home.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and legumes to satisfy customer demand

loans.name: Llaminelsy

texts.es:
Llaminelsy se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes les garantiza una buena calidad de vida gracias a su negocio con el cual generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente junto con su esposo para que en su hogar mejoren las condiciones económicas y puedan tener una buena calidad de vida. Desde hace más de 10 años comenzó a trabajar vendiendo productos en la calle de manera ambulante, y gracias a un gran esfuerzo que hizo logró ubicarse dentro de un local y allí tiene su negocio hasta ahora donde ofrece productos para el hogar a sus clientes. Debido a que sus clientes están aumentando y cada vez demandan más productos, Llaminelsy busca un préstamo para comprar productos para el hogar y ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos en su miscelánea.

De esta manera su negocio saldrá adelante y podrá ofrecer en su hogar unos buenos ingresos para que sigan teniendo una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Llaminelsy is married and has two children for whom she provides a good quality of life. Thanks to her business, she is able to generate income to contribute financially, along with her husband, toward improving the economic conditions in her home and providing a good quality of life for her family. 

More than ten years ago she began selling items as a street vendor, and, through tremendous effort, she managed to secure a storefront.  To this day she has kept her store there, where she offers household products to her customers. Because her customer base is growing and is always demanding more products, Llaminelsy is seeking a loan in order to buy household items and to offer her customers a greater variety of products in her store. 

This way her business will continue to grow and she will be able to earn a good income for her home so her family will continue to enjoy a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy household items and offer her customers a greater variety of products in her store.

loans.name: Abakar Adam

texts.en:
Abakar is a 38-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has 4 children between the ages of 4 and 12. All of them go to school. 

Abakar runs a grocery store and has been in business for 3 years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. He is taking a loan of 800 SDG to purchase chicken and other items. Abakar has no other source of income besides this business.

In 5 years, Abakar would like to open many branches and employ others. His major challenge includes high prices in the market.

loans.use: for buying more chicken, etc.

loans.name: Mireille Chantale

texts.fr: Mireille Chantale est mariée et mère de 01 enfants agé de 30ans. Elle a 01 personne à charge qui n'a pas pas l'age d'aller à l'école.  Elle vend des pagnes et des divers. Mme s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et du Togo. Mme veut acheter des pagnes et des divers. Mme avec ses économies voudrait mieux s'occuper du dernier et surtout mieux supporter ses charges ordinaires.Pour ce objectif, elle a donc obtenu un crédit auprès de Finaev.
texts.en:
Mireille Chantale is married and the mother of one child who is 30 years old.  She has one person in her care, who not of school age. 

Mireille Chantale sells pagnes (colorful African wax cloth) and miscellaneous goods.  She stocks up in one of the markets in Benin as well as in Togo.  She would like to buy pagnes and a variety of other goods.  With her savings, she would like to take better care of the person in her care and, above all, better cover her household expenses. For this purpose, she has obtained a loan from Finadev.

loans.use: to buy 40 'pagnes', three boxes of milk and three boxes of sardines

loans.name: Josiane's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Josiane, la responsable, est agée de 29 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants dont un est scolarisé. Josiane a une boutique où elle vend des mèches, des feuilles de bissapes et des arômes depuis des années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Expérimentée dans le commerce, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle et de contribuer aux dépenses de la famille. Josiane se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en:
This is a group of two people with joint liability. The group’s representative is Josiane, age 29. She is a married mother of two children, one of whom goes to school. She is the lady shown on the left in the photo.

Josiane has a stall where she has been selling hair extensions, bissap leaves (dried hibiscus) and flavorings for several years. She buys her merchandise at a market in Benin. 

An experienced businesswoman, she has requested and obtained a loan from Finadev to meet customer demand and help to cover the family’s expenses.

loans.use: to buy three cartons of hair extensions of various types.

loans.name: Noorelhuda

texts.en:
Noorelhuda who is photographed next to a sign of her project, is a 27-year-old single young woman. For 2 years now, Noorelhuda has been running her project for repairing electronics and designing advertising boards, which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover her needs and the project costs.

Noorelhuda is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more raw materials for making advertising boards and also a new kit for repairing electronics. This will improve Noorelhuda's project by speeding the process of her work, which will satisfy her customers and improve her income.

loans.use: To cover the costs of purchasing more raw materials for making advertising boards and also a new kit for repairing electronics

loans.name: Abdelkareem

texts.en:
Abdelkareem is a 24-year-old single young man. For a year he has been managing a cafeteria in a local Palestinian university, where he sells snacks, sandwiches, soft drinks and hot drinks such as coffee and tea to students. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him, but he also needs more support from time to time to cover its costs.

Abdelkareem is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing snacks, coffee and tea and installing additional shelves. This will increase sales and improve his income.

Abdelkareem is photographed in the cafeteria.

loans.use: To purchase snacks, coffee and tea, and install additional shelves

loans.name: Los Portales De Pariachi Group

texts.es: La Sra. Cristina  tienes 9 hijos ,  actualmente es integrante  en la alcancía comunal “Los portales de pariachi”  grupo  conformado por  7  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Cristina  se dedica a alquilar su casa a una empresa de transportes desde hace 1 año y a su vez vende comida , este negocio surge con la idea de ontener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, Cristina nos cuenta que alquilar su casa le ha generado grandes ingresos y ahora cuentan con clientes fidelizados,con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para ampliar y arregalar su negocio. Cristina   cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Cristina has nine children and is currently a member of the communal bank "Los Portales de Pariachi". The group consists of seven members who are engaged in various commercial activities. 

Cristina has made a living by renting her house to a transport company for a year and she also sells food. She started this business in order to acquire a better quality of life for her family. Cristina says that renting her house has generated great income and now she has loyal customers. In order to keep growing she applied for a new loan to expand and repair her business. 

Cristina will meet her goals with hard work and effort, and the loans from Edaprospo will also help her.

loans.use: to expand and repair her business

loans.name: Alda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que vão a Escola, vive na casa própria e sustenta mais CINCO NETOS.
É assistente técnica, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, portas, janelas, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com a sua casa.
No futuro deseja continuar com os seus estudos e concluir a sua obra, para tal compromete-se a pagar o empréstimo devidamente para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e cuidar dos seus filhos e netos.
texts.en: Alda is married and the mother of two children who go to school.  She lives in her own home and also supports five grandchildren.  She is a technical assistant.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, doors, windows, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.  In the future, she hopes to continue with her studies and finish her home.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the elevated cost of living and caring for her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, doors, windows, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: La Finquita Group

texts.es:
El grupo la finquita lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Mireya del Carmen quien en un inicio vendía plantas y frutas  luego invirtió en  ropa y sandalias las cuales comercializa de manera ambulante desde hace 4 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería en especial pantalones, camisas, sandalia…etc.
Las otras integrantes son Kelly quien vende plata y ropa íntima; y  Eveling quien vende pollo  y carne desde hace dos años.
texts.en:
The La Finquita Group is made up of three workers and entrepreneurs, one of whom is Mireya del Carmen. She started out selling plants and fruits. Later, she invested in clothing and sandals, which she has been selling as a street vendor for the last four years. The loan will be invested in merchandise, in particular pants, shirts, sandals, etc. 

The other business partners are Kelly, who sells silver and undergarments, and Eveling, who has been selling chicken and meats for the past two years.

loans.use: to purchase clothing merchandise.

loans.name: Jazmin Group

texts.es:
El grupo Jazmín lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es el señor Eduardo quien se dedica al servicio de fontanería negocio en el que invertirá el crédito con la compra de inyector, llaves, tubos…etc. para la relizacio de unos trabajos que tiene.
Las otras integrantes son Kenia Auxiliadora quien vende cosméticos, perfumes, sandalias y cremas, y Martin se dedica al comercio de leña.
texts.en:
The Jazmín group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people, one of which is a man called Eduardo. He makes a living as a plumber. He will invest the loan in his business through the purchase of injectors, faucets and pipes etc. to carry out a number of jobs he has. 

The other members are Kenia Auxiliadora who sells cosmetics, perfumes, sandals and creams and Martin who works in wood sales.

loans.use: to buy injectors, faucets and pipes etc.

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en:
Ziad is 32 years old. He is married and has two children. He lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He is employed by the public electricity corporation.

He requested a loan of 199,992 YER to buy furniture and household utensils. In the future, he hopes to buy a car and open an electrician shop.

loans.use: to buy furniture and household utensils for his house

loans.name: Valor Y Sacrificio Group

texts.es: Karen de 28 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo el cual aún depende de ella. Lleva 3 años como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir desde hace 4 años. Comenzó por medio de la motivación de su madre, quien le indicó que ponga su propio negocio y trabaje como una persona independiente. También se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace 2 años. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, Karen ha logrado construir su casa. Actualmente ella cubre los gastos de agua, luz y teléfono; mientras que su esposo cubre los gastos de alimentación y educación de sus hijos. Su plan para el futuro es abrir una librería en su propio domicilio. Ella usó el crédito en la compra de mercadería para su negocio. Karen pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Valor y Sacrificio”, el cual está conformado por 8 personas y lleva el cargo de presidenta desde hace 8 meses.
texts.en:
Karen is 28 years old, is a live-in partner and has one son, who still depends on her. She has a been a client at Edaprospo for 3 years and has been selling garments for a living for the past 4 years. She started on the advice of her mother, who suggested that she open her own business and work independently. She has also been selling cosmetics for the past 2 years. 

Through her hardwork and determination, Karen has been able to build her own house. Today, she pays the water, electricity, and telephone bills, while her husband takes care of the food costs and schooling for the children. Her plan for the future is to open a bookstore in her own house. 

Karen belongs to the communal bank called "Valor y Sacrifico", which consists of 8 people.  She has been the president for the past 8 months. She used her loan towards the purchase of merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 26-year-old married man with two children aged one and three years old. Peter takes care of his two siblings and supports in them in paying their school fees. Peter operates a retail shop on the outskirts of Lyantonde. He has no other source of income and therefore wholly depends on the shop to meet the demands of his family which makes him work all the days of the week.

He will use this particular loan to buy more stock such as soap, salt, sugar among other home use items for the shop so that he can sell them and boost his income. His main challenge is competition from other retailers and limited capital. He dreams of expanding his business and relocating to town. Peter is very shrewd.

loans.use: To buy stock for his retail shop.

loans.name: Estrellas De Fatima Group

texts.es: La Sra. Graciela  es conviviente   tiene 58 años  de edad y tiene 2 hijos , actualmente  es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Estrellas de fatima ” grupo  conformado por  10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Graciela trabaja en un club de administradora este trabajo consiste en cuidar el club y administrar los eventsos que se realizan, graciela vive en ese club desde hace diez años, ella empezo a trabajar con el proposito de ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y educacion de sus hijos, gracias  a su esfuerzo y dedicación a ahorrado un dinero y  su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad de vida. Graciela a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para  remodelar su casa. Graciela cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prestamos de edaprospo la ayudaran.
texts.en:
Graciela is 58 years old, and has a live-in partner and 2 children. She is currently a member of the communal bank "Estrellas de fatima" (Fatima's Stars), a group comprised of 10 members who work in different business activities. 

Graciela works as an administrator for a club, which consists of taking care of club affairs and administering the events that are put on. Graciela has been in this club for 10 years. She began working with the goal of helping her spouse with household expenses and with the education of her children. Thanks to her efforts and dedication she has saved some money and her family has a better quality of life. 

Graciela has asked for a new loan to remodel her house. Graciela will achieve her goals with lots of work and effort, and EDAPROSPO's loans will help her.

loans.use: to remodel her house

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
This is Lea. She previously borrowed a 50,000 PHP loan that she used to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. Her earnings were a big help for her family's personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed in the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profit from her business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and pay for the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Lea hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all of her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed for her business.

loans.name: Ansatou's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré le 13 décembre 2011 le banc villageois de Diambars de Doumassou  dont fait partie ce groupe est au deuxième cycle. Les membres sont très dynamiques et font preuve d’un esprit de groupe dans toute situation. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Souracata, (assise à l’extrême droite avec la main droite levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette. Elle est veuve et en a charge 02 de ses filles et un garçon. Très déterminée dans ses tâches et activités, elle est vendeuse de glace dans son quartier, elle livre aussi certaines boulangeries de la place. 

Son nouveau prêt va lui permettre de diversifier son activité en y ajoutant la vente de crème glacée.

 Les bénéfices lui permettront de subvenir aux besoins de consommation de sa famille et à renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
Launched on December 13, 2011, the Diambars de Doumassou Group's banc villageois [lending group], which this group belongs to, is on its second cycle. The members are very lively and demonstrate a group spirit in all situations. Their primary occupation is small business.

Mrs. Souracata (seated at the far right, with her right hand raised) is the starring borrower. She is a widow and has two of her daughters and one boy in her care. Very determined in her tasks and activities, she is an ice seller in her neighborhood, also delivering [for] several local bakeries.

Her new loan will allow her to diversify her business by adding the sale of ice cream. The profits will allow her to meet the consumption needs of her family and to strengthen her business.

loans.use: To diversify her business by adding the sale of ice cream.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
This is Marilyn. She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. Her earnings are a big help for their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs and the educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Marilyn hopes her business will expand and grow into a mini-grocery through all her hard work on her business. She also hopes to give her child a good and high-quality education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Apresse Doumassou Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de femmes très dynamiques dans les activités du banc villageois depuis sa création en  2009. Une bonne ambiance anime les rencontres des membres qui pratiquent le petit commerce.

Madame  Amiata (assise à extrême droite avec la main) est l’emprunteuse vedette  du groupe. Elle est âgée de 42ans, est mariée sans enfant en charge. Elle dispose d’un frigo où elle prépare des jus de bissap, de pain de singe et autres jus dérivés des fruits locaux. 

Avec ce prêt elle va acheter des sacs de pain de singe d’une valeur de 30 000 FCFA du bissap en quantité suffisante et un sac de sucre pour éviter la rupture en période hivernale.

En plus de payer l’électricité, les bénéfices lui permettront de prendre en charge son père et d’augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group of energetic women has played a dynamic role in the activities of the Banc Villageois ever since its inception in 2009. A great atmosphere fills the gatherings of the members, who work in small trade. 

Mrs. Aminata (sitting at the far right with her hand raised) is the featured borrower from this group. She is a 42-year-old married woman without any dependent children. She has a refrigerator where she keeps the juices that she prepares including bissap (hibiscus flower), pain de singe (baobab fruit) and other local fruit juices. 

She will use this loan to buy 30,000 CFAF worth of bags of pain de singe, a sufficient amount of bissap, and one bag of sugar to last through the rainy season.

In addition to covering electricity costs, the profits will allow her to care for her father and add to her savings.

loans.use: to buy 30,000 CFAF worth of bags of pain de singe, a sufficient amount of bissap, and one bag of sugar to last her through the rainy season.

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 27/06/2008.Il est composé de 04 membres qui sont issus de la meme zone urbaine.

Madame traoré en bleu sur la photo est responsable du groupe.Elle est âgée de 48 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 09 enfants dont 05 filles.

Son activité consiste à faire du commerce de l'arachide. Elle dispose d'une bonne  expérience pour ce type d'activité.

Son prêt lui permettra de s'approvisionner  en arachides afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientéle.

Son objectif est d'assurer la formation de ses enfants et de participer aux charges familiales.
texts.en:
This group was created on June 27, 2008. It is composed of four members who are from the same urban area.

Madame Traoré, in blue in the photo, is the group leader. She is 48 years old, married, and mother of 9 children, 5 of whom are girls.

Her business consists of selling groundnuts. She has a good work experience for this type of business.

Her loan will allow her to stock up on groundnuts in order to satisfy her customer's demands.

Her objective is to provide for her children's education and to assist with the family's expenses.

loans.use: Acheter des arachides destinés à la revente

loans.name: Boubane's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe à été créé depuis le 23 juillet 2011.IL est composé de 07 membres.
Madame cissé; à l’extrême droite sur la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe.

Elle est née le 20/08/1977, divorcée et mére de 04 enfants dont une fille.Sa principale activité est le commerce de tissus et de produits cosmétiques.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant des années.

Avec ce financement de 500 000 cf a elle va acheter des tissus d'une valeur de 300 000 cfa et des produits cosmétiques pour une valeur de 100 000 cfa .

Ses objectifs sont: assurer la scolarité de ses enfants,couvrir les frais médicaux et la prise en charge de la nourriture de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group has been running since July 23, 2011. It is composed of 7 members.
Madame Cissé, on the far right of the photo raising her hand, is the group leader.
She was born on August 20, 1977, is divorced and is the mother of four children, including one girl. Her principal activity is the sale of fabric and cosmetics.
She has a good work experience for this type of activity, having practiced it for years.
With this loan of 500,000 CFA, she is going to buy fabric valuing 300,000 CFA and cosmetics valuing 100,000 CFA. 
Her objectives are: provide for her children's education, cover their medical expenses and the cost of their food.

loans.use: to buy fabric and cosmetics.

loans.name: Faty's Group

texts.fr:
Ce BV est crée depuis le 20 décembre 2011. Une bonne cohésion et collaboration ont que les femmes se sont regrouper dans ce BV.En cette période d'hivernage les femmes ont comme activité principale la culture d'arachide.
Marame debout sur la photo et levant est âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 04 garçons et 03 filles.Elle a comme activité principale l'embouche mais en cette période hivernale elle envisage de faire la culture.
Avec le prêt reçu elle va acheter de l'arachide pour la semence.Les récoltes vont être vendues, et les recettes lui permettront de reprendre son activité de l'embouche en achetant des brebis et chèvres.
Avec les bénéfices génères, elle contribue dans les dépenses quotidiennes  de la familles et tantôt dans la scolarité et les frais médicaux des enfants
texts.en:
This banc villageois was created on the 20th of December, 2011. The women got together to form the banc villageois as they have a good cohesion and work well together. During the rainy season, the women's primary activity is the cultivation of groundnuts.

Marame, standing in the picture and raising her hand, is 36 years old. She is married and the mother of 7 children, 4 boys and 3 girls. Her primary business is animal fattening but during this rainy season, she is considering farming. She will buy some groundnut seeds with the loan she receives. The harvest will be sold and the takings will enable her to resume her fattening business by buying ewes and goats. She uses the profits generated by her business to contribute to the daily household expenses and occasionally to pay the children's educational and medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy groundnut seeds.

loans.name: Sokhna's Group

texts.fr:
Ce BV est crée depuis le 20 décembre 2011. Une bonne cohésion et collaboration ont que les femmes se sont regrouper dans ce BV.En cette période d'hivernage les femmes ont comme activité principale la culture d'arachide.
Maréme âgée de 60 ans est debout sur la photo en lavant la main. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants en charge.
Avec le prêt reçu elle envisage d'acheter 2 à 3  bidons d'huile de 20 litres selon ses possibilités qu'elle revend dans le village. A noter qu'elle mène d'autres activités parallèle comme la vente de légumes et de produits  cosmétiques en période de saison sèche.
les bénéfices lui permettent de renforcer son épargne et d'entretenir ses petits enfants en cas de maladie et pour leur scolarité.
texts.en:
This banc villageois was created on the 20th of December, 2011. The women got together to form this banc villageois as they have a good cohesion and collaborate closely with each other. During the rainy season, the women's primary activity is the cultivation of groundnuts.

Marame, standing in the picture and raising her hand, is 60 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 dependent children. With the loan she receives, she plans to buy 2 or 3 20-litre cans of oil, according to her means, to resell in her village. She also has parallel businesses, such as the sales of vegetables and beauty products during the dry season. The profits generated by her businesses allow her to build up her savings and to take care of her grand-children when they are sick, and cover their educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20-litre cans of oil.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: La señora Reina y su esposo son propietarios de un taller de enderezado y pintura. Del esfuerzo en el negocio han logrado mantenerse, pero ellos desean darles mejor servicio a sus clientes así mismo comprando artículos de trabajo. La señora Reina administra el negocio con mucho detalle para que la cuentas al final del día salga bien y lo que ella aprecia es poder compartir con su esposo un negocio y el tiempo que le dedican para progresar y crecer su ingreso económico es impresionante dando un buen servicio y dándose a conocer en su localidad.
texts.en: Reyna and her husband own an auto body and paint shop. Due to the strength of the business they have successfully supported themselves but they desire to give their clients better service by buying work materials. Reina manages the business with much detail so that the the accounts come out correctly at the end of the day.  She appreciates being able to share the business with her husband and the time she is dedicated to improve and increase her income.  It is amazing to offer a good service and get to know the community.

loans.use: to purchase material for her business

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É professor e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas de zinco, ferro, Areia, barrotes e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e construir um murro de vedação para oferecer melhor conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e a sua formação superior.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a teacher and a staffer of the Ministry of Education. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, zinc sheets, iron, sand, beams, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and a surrounding wall so that he can offer more comfort for his family. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the high cost of living and his higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, zinc sheets, iron, sand, beams, etc.).

loans.name: Justino

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos dos quais 2 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 sobrinho que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como técnico administrativo numa empresa privada. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, estribos, areia, chapas de zinco, ferro e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua residência, aumentar o seu nível de escolaridade e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento, e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children, two of whom still attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a nephew who lives with him.
He works as an administrative assistant for a private company. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, brackets, sand, zinc sheets, iron, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home, upgrade his education level and improve his family's living conditions. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the lack of funds for investing and the high cost of living.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, brackets, sand, zinc sheets, iron, etc.).

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 4 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 3 netos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negócio de venda de produtos alimentares e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, cervejas, vinho, refrescos, e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 

No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
She's single and has four children, all of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports three grandchildren who live with her.
She's a trader who runs her own business selling foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, flour, beer, wine, refreshments, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to enlarge her house so that her family will be more comfortable. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is to work even harder in order to increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, flour, beer, wine, refreshments, etc.).

loans.name: Orieta

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filho dos quais 2 vão a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negócio de venda de roupa. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar capulanas, camisas, lenços e saias, para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir uma boutique  onde possa expor as roupas e fazer um curso de inglês para melhorar o seu curriculum, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de meios financeiros para expandir o seu negócio e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en: Orieta is married and is the mother of three children, two of whom go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She owns her own business selling clothing.  She will use this loan to buy capulanas [a garment worn in Mozambique], shirts, scarves, and skirts to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to build a boutique where she can display her merchandise and to take an English class.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of financing to expand her business and the elevated cost of living.

loans.use: to buy capulanas, shirts, scarves, and skirts to increase her quantity of merchandise.

loans.name: Julio

texts.pt:
Casado e não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando dinheiro para auxiliar nas despesas alimentares. 	
Trabalha como docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 

No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, mobilar, e comprar uma viatura para facilitar na deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e o seu maior empenho profissional.
texts.en: Julio is married and doesn't have any children.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his family by sending them money to assist with their food costs.  He works as a teacher as part of the Ministry of Education.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, beams, zinc sheets, windows, etc.) to continue work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish his home and to furnish it and to buy a vehicle to facilitate his commute to work.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the elevated cost of living and his greater professional effort.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, beams, zinc sheets, windows, etc.).

loans.name: Sergio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus cunhados que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha como docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, aros, barrotes, chapas de zinco, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 

No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, e continuar com os estudos ate a sua formação superior, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado preço do material de construção e poder cumprir com todos projectos traçados.
texts.en:
Sergio is married and the father of two school-aged children. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his two brothers-in-law, who live with them. He works as a teacher and is on the Ministry of Education's staff. He will use this loan to purchase construction materials (iron, beams, sheet metal, windows, etc.) to continue the construction on his house.
In the future he hopes to finish building his house and continue his studies, and he is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. The challenge he faces is the high cost of construction materials and being able to complete all of the projects he has planned for himself.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (iron, beams, sheet metal, windows, etc.) to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Alice

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do negócio de venda de produtos alimentares, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (açúcar, farinha, refrescos, massa, refrescos, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio criando frangos para vender e construir uma casa digna para oferecer conforto aos seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no transporte dos produtos.
texts.en: Alice is married and has five school-aged children. She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two nephews who live with them. She has a business selling food products, and she plans to use this loan to purchase merchandise (sugar, flour, soft drinks, pasta, etc.) to increase her stock. In the future she hopes to expand her business and raise chickens. She also wants to build a decent house so she can offer her children a comfortable home. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can request more from Hluvuku. The challenge she faces is the high cost of living and buying a vehicle to help with transporting her stock.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (sugar, flour, soft drinks, pasta, etc.) to increase her stock.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de uma filha que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 irmãos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, e construir uma mercearia onde possa expor os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no transporte dos produtos e garantir o sustento da sua filha e dos irmãos.
texts.en: Catarina is a single mother with one school-aged daughter. She lives with her family in a home they own and also supports two brothers who live with them. She has a business selling staple goods. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cinder blocks, cement, beams, sheet metal, etc.) to continue building her house. In the future she hopes to finish the house and build a shop where she can display her products, so she is committed to paying off this loan so she can ask for further loans from Hluvuku. The challenge she faces is to acquire a vehicle with which to transport her merchandise and help her support the rest of her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cinder blocks, cement, beams, sheet metal, etc.) to continue building her house.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos, dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como segurança numa empresa privada e também serralheiro no tempo livre. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, ferro, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir da sua casa e construir uma oficina para serralharia onde possa desenvolver e expor o seu trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida, e o salário baixo que não permite realizar todos os seus projectos.
texts.en: Eusebio is married and the father of six children, three of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. He works as a security guard at a private company and is also a metalworker in his free time. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, etc.) to continue building his house. In the future he hopes to finish his house and build a workshop for his metalworking, so he is committed to paying off this loan so he can ask for further loans from Hluvuku. The challenge he faces is the high cost of living and his low salary, which isn't enough to carry out all of his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, etc.) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials (sand, cement, cinder blocks, iron, deed fees, etc.) so he can start building a house.

loans.name: Ivone

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua irmã que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dona de venda de roupa de cama e carne. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (lençóis, mantas, fronhas, carne, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja remodelar e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer conforto e segurança a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida, e as dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her sister, who lives with her.
She's a trader who owns a business selling bed linen and meat. With the current loan she intends to purchase products (sheets, blankets, pillowcases, meat, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to remodel and enlarge her house so that she can offer her family comfort and safety. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is the high cost of living and the financial hardships.

loans.use: to purchase sheets, blankets, pillowcases, meat and other items for selling.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos, todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 neto que vive com ele. 	
É militar e negociante dedica-se a venda de produtos alimentares. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, óleo, amendoim, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja oficializar a sua união com a sua esposa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado preço dos produtos, e as dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
He's married and has six children, all of them adults. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a grandson who lives with him.
He's in the military, and he's also a businessman who sells foodstuffs. With the current loan he intends to purchase goods (rice, beans, olive oil, peanuts, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to officially marry his wife. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the high cost of merchandise and the financial hardships.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, olive oil, peanuts and other items for selling.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seu pai enviando dinheiro para as despesas alimentares. 	
Trabalha como operador de máquina empilhadora. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, arames, pregos, chapas de zinco, e outros) para a cobertura da obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa, crescer profissionalmente e desenvolver uma actividade sustentável, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade financeira e a falta de fundo para aplicar nos seus projectos.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his father by sending him money for food expenses.
He works as a forklift operator. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (beams, wire, nails, zinc sheets, etc.) to build the roofing for his house.
In the future he wants to finish building his home, grow professionally and develop a sustainable business. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the financial hardship and the lack of funds for investing in his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (beams, wire, nails, zinc sheets, etc.).

loans.name: Joao Tene

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando dinheiro para as despesas alimentares. 	
Trabalha como operador de equipamento nos Caminhos de Ferro Moçambique. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, ferro, areia, pedra, cimento, e outros) para dar inicio a obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa e construir um estabelecimento comercial para aumentar a sua renda mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado preço do material de construção e garantir a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
He's married and has five children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his parents by sending them money for food expenses.
He works as an equipment operator for Caminhos de Ferro Moçambique (a railway company in Mozambique). With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (bricks, iron, sand, cement, etc.) in order to begin building his house.
In the future he wants to finish building his home and to build a store so that he can improve his monthly income. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the high cost of construction supplies and ensuring his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (bricks, iron, sand, rocks, cement, etc.).

loans.name: Laiane

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um sobrinho que vive com ele.
Trabalha como servente nos Caminhos de Ferro de Moçambique. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, janelas, portas, pedra, cimento, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e o bem-estar da sua família.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children, both of them adults. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a nephew who lives with him.
He works as an attendant for Caminhos de Ferro Moçambique (a railway company in Mozambique). With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (beams, windows, doors, rocks, cement, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wants to finish building and furnishing his home. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the high cost of living and his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (beams, windows, doors, rocks, cement, etc.).

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos, dos quais 4 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como guarda numa empresa privada. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, barrotes, ferro, cimento, pedra, e outros) para reabilitar e ampliar a sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para facilitar a sua deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o alto preço do material de construção e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
He's married and has eight children, four of whom still attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He works as a security guard for a private company. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (bricks, beams, iron, cement, rocks, etc.) in order to rehabilitate and enlarge his house.
In the future he wants to finish building his home and purchase a vehicle to make it easier for him to commute to work. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so that he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is the high price of construction supplies and the high cost of living.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (bricks, beams, iron, cement, rocks, etc.).

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, destes apenas 1 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como docente e quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, cimento, pregos, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa e mobilar, mais tarde abrir um negócio para a sua esposa que se encontra desempregada, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir o ensino superior e o alto preço do material de construção.
texts.en:
Gabriel is married and the father of two children, one of whom attends school. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else.
He works as a teacher and is on the Ministry of Education's staff. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (sheet metal, beams, cement, nails, etc.) to continue building his house.
In the future he hopes to finish building and furnishing his house and then open a business for his wife, who is unemployed. He is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku.
The challenges he faces are finishing his education and the high cost of construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sheet metal, beams, cement, nails, etc.).

loans.name: Ps 2 Mbousnakh Group

texts.fr:
Madame Saye est une femme mariée âgée de 45 ans et mère 6 enfants dont trois filles et trois garçons. 

Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 24/05/2001 et entretient de bonnes relations avec les autres 

membres du banc. Elle est debout à droite de la photo et habillé en tissu fleurette. Elle fait du commerce et 

de l'aviculture. Avec son nouveau de 500000 franc elle va acheter des arachides pour transformation  en huile; 

elle va également acheter des sujets . Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans cette activité pour l'avoir 

pratiqué depuis longtemps.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettent de payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants qui sont confiés à 

un parent proche en ville.
texts.en: Saye is a 45-year-old married woman and the mother of 6 children, 3 girls and 3 boys. She has been a member of the banc villageois since the 24th of May, 2001, and has good relations with the other banc members. She standing on the right of the photo, dressed in floral fabric. She is a retailer and a poultry farmer. With her new loan of 500 000 francs, she will buy groundnuts from which to make oil, and she will also buy some bird stock. She has good experience in the business, having been in this line of work for a long time. The profits from her business allow her to pay for the educational expenses of her children who are in the care of a close relative in town.

loans.use: to buy divers products.

loans.name: Ps 1 Mbousnakh Group

texts.fr:
Madame Diagne est une femme mariée âgée de 27 ans et mère de quatre enfants  tous des garçons. Elle est membre 

du banc villageois depuis le 24/05/2001 et entretient de bonnes relations avec ses camarades.

Elle est debout à droite de la photo habillé en tissus wax bleu jaune et un foulard à rouge à la tète. 

Elle fait du commerce de produits divers depuis son adhésion dans le banc villageois.

Avec son nouveau crédit de 500000 francs elle va se procurer des tissus des bassines et des chaussures qu'elle 

va revendre au niveau de son village. 

Avec ses bénéfices elle appui son mari dans la gestion des dépenses familiales.
texts.en: Diagne is a 27-year-old married woman and the mother of 4 children, all boys. She has been a member of the banc villageois since the 24th of May, 2001, and maintains good relations with her workmates. She is standing on the right of the picture, dressed in a blue and yellow wax fabric dress, with a red scarf on her head. She has been selling a variety of products since becoming a member of the banc villageois. With her new 500 000 franc loan, she will buy some fabric, some basins and some shoes, which she will sell in her village. She uses her profits to support her husband with the management of the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy basins, fabrics and shoes.

loans.name: Pc 1 Mbousnakh Group

texts.fr:
Madame Diouma est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mère de 6 enfants dont deux filles et quatre 

garçons. Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 24/05/2001 et partagent de bonnes relations sociales 

avec 

ses camarades. Elle est debout à droite de la photo habillé en rose.


 Elle fait du commerce de bétail depuis longtemps , elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce secteur. 

Avec son nouveau prêt de 200000 elle va acheter des moutons qu'elle va revendre à Dakar .

Les bénéfices de son activité le permettent de payer les fournitures et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants 

qui sont au Lycée.
texts.en:
Madame Diouma is a 36 year old married woman. She is the mother of six children, two girls and four boys. She has been a member of the village lending group since 5/24/2001 and has good social relations with the other members. She is standing up in the photo, dressed in pink.
She has done business in livestock for a long time and has good professional experience in this sector.
With this new loan of 200000 XOF, she is going to be sheep that she will resell in Dakar.
The revenue from her business allows her to pay for the school supplies and tuition of her children, who are in high school.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Dilia Felicita

texts.es: Dilia es la dueña en las Orquídeas de una papelería, comenta que antes tenía una tienda de abarrotes con la cual empezó su vida comercial pero al no tener mucha experiencia fue presentando varios inconvenientes, uno de ellos fue dar muchos crédito a sus clientes, piensa que no lo manejo de bien por lo que le fue mal, también se incremento la competencia por lo que sus ventas bajaron así que decidió liquidar la tienda y con el dinero abrió una papelería. Tiene ya 9 años con el negocio y le va mejor porque en su sector no tiene competencia, a todo esto le ayuda que su hijo a lado abrió un cyber así complementan ambos negocios. La papelería la abre todos los días de lunes a sábado en la atención le ayuda su esposo ya que el realiza fletes en un camión y cuando no tiene carga tiene tiempo libre. Con el crédito que está solicitando piensa comprar mercadería como cuadernos, hojas, láminas, plumas, cartulina, goma etc. Espera en los proximos años seguir creciendo en su negocio para terminar el segundo piso de su vivienda para alquilar departamentos y así tener ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Dilia is the owner of a stationery shop in Las Orquídeas. She comments that she had a grocery store before, with which she began her life as a businesswoman, but not having much experience she encountered various problems, one of which was extending a lot of credit to her customers. She thinks she didn't handle it well and so it went badly. Also the competition increased and so her sales went down, so she decided to close the shop and with the money she opened a stationery store. She has had the business for nine years and it's going better for her because there is no competition in her area. Added to all this, her son opened an Internet shop next door and so the two businesses complement one another. 

She opens the stationery store every day Monday to Saturday. Her husband helps her staff the shop since he drives a truck and when he doesn't have a load he has free time. With the loan she is seeking she plans to purchase merchandise such as notebooks, papers, colored art paper, pens, construction paper and erasers among other items. With the loan she is seeking she hopes to finish the second story of her home in order to rent it out and so bring in extra income.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, paper, pens, printed art paper, construction paper and erasers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy beans for sell

loans.name: Al-Riashy Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Riashy and consists of four members: Fatima, Fadiah, Samirh and Fatima. They live in Sana`a, Yemen and are working hard to achieve their goals. Fatima is 45 years old and president of the group. She earns a living by selling incense and other items. When she started, her business was small but thanks to sacrifice and daily hard work, has grown and continually improved. She is asking for a loan for 50,000 YER from AMB to expand her business by buying more incense to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more incense to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Sulisa

texts.en:
Sulisa is a 43-year-old woman who is married with 13 children. She has a small business providing taxi services. She has been in this business for three years.Sulisa needs a loan 
to buy tyres,engine oil and for taxi renewal registration .
Sulisa joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy tyres,engine oil and for taxi renewal  registration.

loans.name: Faifuaina

texts.en:
Faifuaina is a 50-year-old woman who is married with two children. She has a small taxi service business. She has been in this business for five years. 

Faifuaina  needs a loan to service her vehicle, purchase tyres, seat covers and also for taxi renewal registration. She will use her profits to renovate her house and to keep her children in school. Faifuaina joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to service her vehicle, purchase tyres, seat covers and for taxi renewal registration

loans.name: Kagnobon Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois dont fait partie ce groupe est créé le 03 Juin 2010. les membres sont liées solidairement et ont la même activité qui est le commerce de détail.

Madame Diariétou qui est a droite de la photo levant la main est l'emprunteur en vedette. Elle  est veuve, âgée de 54 ans et mère d'une fille de 15 ans. 

Avec ce crédit, elle va acheter 10 sacs de pain de singe, 50 kilogrammes de sucre, et des ingrédients pour faire du jus de fruit, de la glace et de la crème glacée pour vendre. 

Les bénéfices serviront à la prise en charge de sa famille (nourriture, la santé et la scolarité de sa fille).
texts.en:
The village lending group that this group is part of was created on June 3, 2010. The members are linked in solidarity and work in the same business, which is retail sales.

Madame Diariétou, who is at the right of the photo raising her hand, is the featured borrower. She is a 54 year old widow and mother of a 15 year old girl.

With this loan, she is going to buy 10 bags of monkey bread, 50 kilograms of sugar, and ingredients for making fruit juice, sorbet, and ice cream to sell.

The profits will be used to take care of her family (food, health, and her daughter's education).

loans.use: to buy sugar, fruit, and other ingredients to make juice and ice cream to sell.

loans.name: Ndeye Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce bv a été créé le 28 juin 2008.IL est composé des membres issus du même quartier et qui ont pour activité principale le commerce. Madame FATY qui est  à gauche de la photo,est l'emprunteuse vedette.

Elle est âgée de 40 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 05 enfants dont 01 garçon. Son activité est le commerce d'encens;de parfums;d'habits;de drap et de chaussures.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant plusieurs années.

Avec son financement;elle compte acheter de l'encens pour une valeur de 50 000 f;du parfum pour une valeur de 50 000 f;des habits pour 100 000 f et des chaussures pour une valeur de 25 000f.

Son objectif est d'accroitre l'épargne de ses enfants;d'assurer la scolarité de ses enfants et participer à la prise en charge de la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
This village lending group was created June 28, 2008. It is made up of members from the same area and who mainly work in sales. Madame Faty, who is on the left in the photo, is the featured borrower.

She is 40 years old, married, and mother of five children, including one boy. Her main business is the sale of incense, perfume, clothing, sheets, and shoes.

She has good experience for this type of business, having worked in it for several years.

With this loan, she plans to buy 50,000 francs worth of incense, 50,000 francs worth of perfume, 100,000 francs worth of clothing, and 25,000 francs worth of shoes.

Her objective is to increase her children's savings, to provide for their education, and to help provide for their everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy incense, perfume, clothing, and shoes.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
This is Carmen, 63, and she is a resident of Dasmariñas, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married to Gabriel and a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.  

Carmen oversees the operations of their tricycle transportation business. They have one tricycle that carries up to four passengers to their destination within the community. The tricycle driver then remits a boundary (daily quota) each day to her. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy spare parts, accessories, and also pay for the maintenance of her tricycle. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Carmen dreams to be able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. She also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the spare parts and maintenance of their Tricycle unit.

loans.name: Lusia

texts.en: Lusia is a 49 year old married woman with five children. She catches and sells fish in her community to earn a living. She has many years of experience with this business. Lusia needs a loan to buy fishing gear, a new canoe, a spear and to pay for her children's education. She plans to use her profits to improve her family income. Lusia has been a member of SPBD since 2009.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear, a  new canoe, a spear and to pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Rokhaya's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Fatou est une femme mariée âgé de34 et mère de trois enfants.
Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 22/12/2011 et partage de bonnes relations sociales et économiques avec ses camarades.
Fatou fait de la restauration depuis longtemps et dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine. Elle est debout à droite de la photo soulevant la main et habillée en violet avec un écharpe rouge sur la tète . Avec son nouveau crédit de 65000 francs elle va se payer du riz du poissons de l 'huile et des condiments pour la préparation d'un repas qu 'elle va revendre au détail à la gare routière.
Les bénéfices de sont activités lui permettent d'aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille de même que la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Madame Fatou is a 34 year old married woman and mother of three children.
She has been a member of the village lending group since 12/22/2011 and has good social and financial relations with the other members.
Fatou has cooked food to sell for a long time and has good professional experience in this area. She is standing up at the right of the photo raising her hand and dressed in purple with a red scarf on her head. With this new loan of 65,000 francs, she is going to pay for rice, fish, oil, and seasonings to prepare a meal that she will resell in individual portions at the bus station.
The profits from her business will allow her to help her husband with the everyday expenses of her family as well as her children's education.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and seasonings for cooking.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann, 54, is a professional tailor, making US$2 each day in Takeo province. She is married and has three children. Her husband, Nou Sopheap, makes approximately US$3 every day, working as a barber.

Ann would like a loan of US$500 to purchase a motorbike for family transportation. This motorbike would allow her family save a lot of money in terms of using public transportation.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for family transportation

loans.name: Diarra's Group

texts.fr:
Diarra est une femme veuve âgée de 50 ans et mère  de trois enfants dont deux filles et un garçon. Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis sa fondation et elle y est unie avec  ses camarades par de bonnes relations sociales et économiques. Madame Diarra est debout à droite de la photo la main levée habillée en tissu vert et blanc couvert d'un écharpe blanc. Elle s'active dans le petit commerce et l’aviculture depuis bientôt 16 ans et dispose d'une bonne expérience. Son nouveau crédit 180000 lui permettra de se payer de la marchandise pré citée et des poussins qu'elle va élevé et revendre plus tard.
les bénéfices de son activité lui permettent de payer la scolarité de ses enfants et de satisfaire leurs besoins alimentaires quotidiens.
texts.en:
Diarra is a 50 year old widowed woman and mother of three children, two girls and a boy. She has been a member of the village lending group since its foundation and she is united with the other members through good social and financial relations. Madame Diarra is standing up at the right of the photo with her hand raised, dressed in green and white with a white scarf. She has been active in small business and poultry farming for nearly 16 years and has good experience. Her new loan of 180,000 XOF will allow her to pay for the aforementioned merchandise and chicks, which she is going to raise and resell later.
The profits from her business will allow her to pay for her children's education and to satisfy their everyday needs for food.

loans.use: to buy fabric, shoes, and chicks.

loans.name: Soukeye's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Soukey est une femme mariée âgée de 42 ans et mère de six enfants dont quatre filles et 2 garçons.

Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le cycle premier du banc et partagent de bonnes relations avec ses 

camarades issus du même quartier et pratiquant presque la même activité. Elle s’active dans le commerce depuis 

longtemps et dispose d'une bonne expérience. Elle est debout à gauche de la photo la main levée et habillée en 

rose et bleu. Son nouveau crédit de 400000 franc lui permettra de se payer deux cartons de poussins et 6 sacs d'aliment.
Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettent de payer certains fournitures scolaires de ses enfants et de subvenir à 

ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Mrs. Soukeye, age 42, is a married mother of six children, four girls and two boys. She is standing on the left in the photo, her hand raised, and dressed in pink and blue.

She has been a member of the local Banc Villageois from the beginning, and she maintains a good rapport with colleagues from her neighborhood who practice mainly the same activity. She has been a merchant for a long time, and she has a good command of her activity. Her new loan of 400,000 francs will allow her to buy two cartons of chicks and six bags of chicken feed. 

The profits earned through this activity will help her to pay for some of her children’s school supplies, and to provide for her own needs.

loans.use: to buy chicks for her poultry farming activity.

loans.name: Ndiada's Group

texts.fr:
Madame est Fatou est une femme mariée âgée de 56 ans et mère de  cinq enfants dont quatre garçons et une fille.

elle est membre du banc villageois depuis son cycle premier . Son groupe est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et des quartiers environnants unis par de bonnes relations .

Elle s'active dans l'aviculture et le petit commerce d’encens depuis longtemps et dispose d'une bonne 

expérience dans ce domaine. Elle est debout à gauche de la photo la main levée habillée en robe jaune avec rallure blanc. Son nouveau crédit de 50000 lui permettra de se 110 sujets et de l’encens qu'elle va revendre au détails.

Les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de se payer des médicaments pour ses enfants en cas  de maladie .
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatou is a 56-year old married woman. She is the mother of five: four sons and one daughter. She has been a member of this Banc Villageois since its initial loan cycle. Her group is composed of women living in the same neighborhood and maintaining friendly relations. She grows poultry and also sells incense. She has been doing this for a long time and has plenty of experience. In the photo, she is standing on the left dressed in a yellow-and-white outfit, raising her hand. Her new loan of 50,000 [West African Francs] will allow her [to buy] 110 chicks as well as incense to be retailed.
The revenues brought in by her business allow her to pay for her children’s medications in case of illness.

loans.use: to buy chicks for raising as well as incense for reselling.

loans.name: Mareme's Group

texts.fr:
Mareme est une femme célibataire âgée de 26 ans sans enfants .Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 29/05/2009. Son groupe d'appartenance est composé suite à de bons liens sociaux et économiques. Elle s'active dans le petit commerce depuis son adhésion dans le banc villageois. Elle est debout sur la photo à droite la main levée habillée en pantalon noir et body bleu. Son nouveau crédit de 70000 francs lui permettra de se procurer 50 bout les  de parfums et du savons liquide qu'elle vend revendre au niveau de son quartier.
Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettront de renforcer ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois  et de diversifier son activité.
texts.en:
Mareme is a single 26 year old woman. She doesn't have any children. She has been a member of the "banc villageois" since 29/05/2009. Her group consists of members with good social and economic connections. She has been involved in small trade since joining the "banc villageois". She is standing on the right of the photo dressed in black trousers and a blue top with her hand raised. This new loan of 70,000 francs will enable her to buy 50 bottles of perfume and liquid soap that she can sell retail in her neighbourhood.
She will use the profits to increase her savings in the banc villagois and diversify her business.

loans.use: to buy perfume and soap

loans.name: Mame Coumba's Group

texts.fr:
Madame korka est une femme célibataire âgée de 35 ans sans enfants. Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis son cycle premier et elle y est unie par de bonnes relations sociales avec les membres de son groupe composé de femmes de son quartiers et des quartiers environnants. Elle est debout à droite de la photo la main levée habillé en robe rouge avec des raillures violets.
Son nouveau crédit de 85000 lui permettra de se procurer des tissus à Dakar pour les revendre au détail dans son quartier.
les bénéfices de son activité lui permettent de gérer les dépenses personnelles et de renforcer son capital.
texts.en:
Korka is a single, 35-year-old woman with no children.
