She has been a member of the banc villageois since its first cycle, and she is united in it with other women from her neighborhood and surrounding neighborhoods with whom she has good social relationships. She is standing on the far right of the photo with her hand raised, wearing the red dress with purple accents. 

Her new loan of 85,000 XOF will allow her to buy fabric in Dakar to resell at retail in her neighborhood. The profits from her business will allow her to manage her personal expenses and increase her capital.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Emercinda

texts.es:
Emercinda tiene 48 años, tiene dos hijos pero ahora sólo vive con el de 13 años, su actual pareja es Alberto. La casa donde viven es propia, la heredó de sus padres y se ubica en el caserío de Casacoto, Tarma.
Desde que se separó del padre de sus dos hijos (hace 10 años), se encarga sola de las labores en casa. Ella es agricultora hace más de 25 años y gracias a su ardua labor logró adquirir terrenos en los que ahora produce papas, arvejas, habas, maíz, flores y otros productos, según la temporada. Ella y Alberto se dedican con ahínco a las labores del campo, de esa manera han logrado comprarse terrenos y dejar de gastar en el arriendo. Sus meta está enfocada en aumentar su producción, ya que conocen compradores que llevan sus productos a Lima (capital), por eso a Emercinda no le faltan pedidos.

Este es su crédito número 4 con MFP y al igual que en los ciclos anteriores, menciona que será puntal en el pago de las cuotas. Pertenece al banco comunal “Sembradoras de Casacoto” donde se siente muy a gusto.
Emercinda destinará el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de semillas de papas, con 1000 soles; bolsas de abono y fertilizantes, con 2000 soles; y lo sobrante será para el pago de personal quienes apoyarán en la actividad.
texts.en:
Emercinda, 48, has two children but only lives with the 13-year-old and her current husband, Alberto.  The house she lives in is her own, as she inherited it from her parents.  It is located in the rural community of Casacoto, Tarma.

Ever since she divorced the father of her two sons (ten years ago), she takes care of the household chores on her own.  She has been a farmer for over 25 years and, thanks to her hard work, she has been able to buy land where she now grows potatoes, peas, beans, corn, flowers and other crops, depending on the season.  She and Alberto work hard on their land and have been able to buy it instead of having to spend money renting.  Her goal is to increase crop production since she knows buyers who take the produce to Lima (capital city), so Emercinda is never lacking orders.

This is her fourth loan through MFP and, as with the previous loans, she claims she is committed to paying it back on time.  She belongs to the communal bank "Sembradoras de Casacoto", where she is very comfortable.  She will use the loan to buy potato seeds (1,000 PEN) and sacks of fertilizer (2,000 PEN), and will use the rest to hire farm workers.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds and fertilizers, and to hire farm workers.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 38 años, junto a su pareja tiene dos hijas: Andrea y Jimena. Juntos, viven en la casa que obtuvieron por herencia. 
Cuando tuvo 26 años decidió trabajar en el campo, es agricultura, sus principales cultivos constan de papa, habas y arveja; pero hay meses en los que también siembra flores (gladiolos) y hortalizas como zanahorias. “Cultivamos de todo, pero papas, arvejas y habas, mayormente”, comenta.  Sus productos y la tierra son su prioridad, pero a la vez cuenta con otro negocio con el que cubre otros gastos; abrió una tienda de abarrotes en su vivienda, donde ofrece víveres como arroz, azúcar, conservas, frutas y verduras a los pobladores de zona. Tiene planes de sembrar arvejas ahora para cosecharlas en octubre. Menciona que en ese mes el precio de venta siempre es bueno.

Este es su crédito número de 4 con MFP y está muy agradecida por la confianza que pusieron en ella los ciclos anteriores. Pertenece al banco comunal “Sembradoras de Casacoto”, un grupo de mujeres luchadoras y sobresalientes.
Gloria destinará este dinero en la compra de bolsas de fertilizantes y guano de corral para fertilizar los sembríos de arvejas que piensa iniciar este mes y para las papas que ya tiene hace dos meses. Cada saco de fertilizante le cuesta 120 soles, calcula adquirir 20 sacos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 38 years old and has two children with her spouse: Andrea and Jimena. They live together in a house they received through an inheritance.

When she was 26 years old, she decided to work as a farmer and her principal crops are potatoes, beans and peas but there are months in which she also grows flowers (gladiolus) and vegetables like carrots. "We grow everything, but potatoes, peas, and beans mostly," she says. Her products and the land are her own but she also relies on another enterprise to cover her expenses: she opened a grocery store close to her house where she offers goods such as rice, sugar, conserves, fruits and vegetables, to people in the district. She has plans to plant peas now in order to harvest them in October. She mentions that this month the price is particularly good for the peas. 

This is her fourth loan with MFP and is very grateful for the confidence they have put in her in her previous loan cycles. She belongs to a communal bank "Sembradoras de Casacoto" (Farmers of Casacoto), a group made up of born fighters and successful women. 

Gloria will use the money from this loan to purchase  bags of fertilizers and guano to fertilize the pea seedlings that she wants to start this month and for  the potatoes she already bought 2 month ago. Each sack of fertilizer costs 120 soles and she estimates she needs 20 sacks.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers for her cultivation of potatoes and peas.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: La señora Sofia, es una persona de 37 años de edad, de estado civil soltera pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive actualmente en su casa propia junto a su familia y cuenta con 6 dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos. La actividad económica de la clienta es la producción agrícola; los productos agrícolas que cultiva frecuentemente son la papa, haba y arveja en sus terrenos heredados por parte de sus padres que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de T'oqo Rancho del municipio de Tíraque distante aproximadamente a unos 73 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Sofia manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere superarse y ampliar su actividad económica y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de insumos agrícolas que a corto plazo le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos económicos que vayan a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Sofia is 37 years old, single, but lives with her partner. She has completed primary school. She lives in her own home with her family consisting of six dependent members. Sofia works as a farmer growing potatoes, beans, and peas on land inherited from her parents located in the community of T'oqo Rancho in the municipality of Tíraque, about 73 km from the town of Cochabamba. 

Sra. Sofia is a hardworking and responsible person who wishes to get on in life and expand her business. As a result she sees the need for some capital to buy agricultural supplies which, in the short term, will allow her to earn more money and improve the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: Buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: La señora Alicia, es una persona de 28 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive actualmente con su madre que es una persona de la tercera edad y cuenta con una sola dependiente económica a cargo la cual es su pequeña hija. La actividad económica de la clienta es la producción agrícola y los principales productos que cultiva  son la papa, trigo cebada y haba en sus terrenos propios y en las de su madre que están ubicadas en la comunidad de Cebada Jichana del municipio de Tíraque que esta distante a unos 75 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Alicia manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere superarse e incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de abono de gallinaza y otros insumos y de tal forma poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus dependientes.
texts.en: Alicia is a 28 year old woman. She is single and finished primary school. Right now, she lives with her mother, who is eldery. She has one dependent who is her young daughter. Her financial activity agricultural production. She grows potatoes, wheat, barley and beans on her own land and on her mother's, located in the community of Cebada Jichana of the town of Tíraque, 75 Km. from the city of Cochabamba. Alicia says that she is a hardworking and responsible person who wants to get ahead and increase her agricultural production. To that effect, she has decided to ask for investment capital so she can buy chicken manure and other materials. This way, she will be able to improve the quality of life of her dependents.

loans.use: to buy chicken manure fertilizer and potato seed.

loans.name: Zahida's Group

texts.en:
Zahida is 35 years old, married, and a mother of four sons and a daughter. All of her children are enrolled in a local school and getting their education. She is a housewife. She remains at home and does her household responsibilities. Her husband makes and sells bread in a tandoor (a pot that is used in making breads).

Zahida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband's business. With the loan investment he will buy flour and wood in larger quantities to further improve his business. He has been operating his business for many years, and Zahida is hopeful about his business success as a result of the loan investment.

Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Zahida.

loans.use: to buy flour and wood for the bread-making business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials (cement, sand, iron, cement blocks and other items) to start building her house.

loans.name: Felicia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos de corte a longa data. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas e vacinas para aumentar a sua quantidade de frangos. 
No futuro pretende construir mais uma residência para os seus filhos e expandir o seu negócio para outras zonas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar a quantidade do seu negócio para poder abastecer outros mercados.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else other than her children.
She has been running her own business raising and selling broiler chickens for a long time. With the current loan she intends to purchase chicks, feed, vitamins and vaccines in order to increase the quantity of her chickens.
In the future she plans to build another home for her children and to expand her business into other areas. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is stocking up her business in order to supply other markets.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed, vitamins and vaccines in order to increase the quantity of her chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, iron, cement, sand, etc.) in order to enlarge her home.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua neta que vive com ele. 	
É serralheiro de profissão e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (Janelas, barrotes, ferro, cimento, areia e outros) para ampliar a sua residência. 
No futuro pretende continuar a melhorar a sua residência e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é pagar o mais rápido possível para em curto espaço de tempo solicitar outro empréstimo.
texts.en:
He's married and has five children. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his granddaughter who lives with him.
He's a locksmith by trade, and with the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (windows, beams, iron, cement, sand, etc.) in order to enlarge his home.
In the future he plans to keep on improving and furnishing his home. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan as quickly as possible, so that he can request another one within a short period of time.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (windows, beams, iron, cement, sand, etc.) in order to enlarge his home.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais que vivem com ele. 	
É pedreiro de profissão na empresa Bananalandia. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, cimento, areia, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende continuar a ampliar a sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e melhorar o negócio da sua esposa.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his parents who live with him.
He works as a mason for the Bananalândia company. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (iron, cement, sand, bricks, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he plans to keep on enlarging and furnishing his home. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is finishing his house and improving his wife's business.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (iron, cement, sand, bricks, etc.).

loans.name: Francisco

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha na função pública e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar e dar continuidade com os seus estudos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir financiamentos que possam cobrir com os seus projectos.
texts.en:
He's married and has a son who attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He works as a civil servant, and with the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he plans to finish building and furnishing his home, and to continue his studies. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is obtaining loans that can cover his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.).

loans.name: Milagre

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos, 1 deles frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É pensionista e conta com ajuda do seu marido e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, cimento, areia, pedra e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa. 
No futuro gostaria de fazer curso de enfermagem e concluir a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar a sua casa, mobilar e conseguir um meio de transporte para a família.
texts.en:
She's married and has three children, one of whom attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a pensioner and she also gets help from her husband. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, beams, cement, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she would like to study to become a nurse, and to finish building her home. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is finishing and furnishing her house, and also getting a means of transportation for her family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, beams, cement, sand, rocks, etc.).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.).

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 10 filhos 8 já maiores de idade e 2 frequentam Escola, vive na casa próprio e sustenta 3 netos que vivem com ele.	
Pensionista de uma empresa de extracção de pedra. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, blocos e outros) para iniciar uma outra casa para os seus filhos. 
No futuro gostaria de ter casas de aluguer para ajudar nas despesas de educação de seus filhos e netos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir concluir as dependências de aluguer.
texts.en:
He's married and has ten children - eight of them are already adults, and two of them attend school. He lives in a house he owns and also supports three grandchildren who live with him.
He's a pensioner of a stone quarrying company. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.) in order to start building another house for his children.
In the future he would like to own houses for renting, so that he can help with his children and grandchildren's schooling expenses. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is being able to finish building rooms for renting.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.).

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 6 filhos, 2 ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa próprio e não sustenta mais ninguém para além dos filhos menores.	
Tem uma área própria de produção de hortícolas e cereais para venda. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, cimento, areia, blocos e pagar mão de obra) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e mobilar para garantir o conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ter valor suficiente para terminar a obra da sua casa.
texts.en:
She's married and has six children, two of whom still attend school. She lives in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else other than her children.
She owns a plot of land where she produces vegetables and grains for selling. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, cement, sand and bricks) and to pay for labor, so that she can continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building and furnishing her home in order to ensure her family's comfort. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is having enough money for finishing the construction of her house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, cement, sand and bricks) and to pay for labor, so that she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Blanca Esther

texts.es: Blanca es estudiante de 4 año de la Universidad , vive en la ciudad de Cochabamba, en la zona sud de esta cuidad, tiene una pequeña tienda  junto a sus padres de cual obtienen sus ingresos, Por otra parte trabaja como enfermera auxiliar con un sueldo de 400 Bs mensuales, obtiene un salario muy bajo ya que se encuentra en proceso de formación y todavía no es profesional, Ella requería un pequeño préstamo para incrementar algunos insumos en la tienda y así poder genera un mayor ingreso mensual, pues tambien cuenta con una pequeña tienda con lo cual tambie npuede pagar sus estudios. Para ello recurrió a nuestra institución financiera,  quien le facilitó un crédito del proyecto KIVA por lo cual ella está muy agradecida, en especial a  KIVA por canalizar micro préstamos a personas con necesidades económicas que además  les sean de ayuda para mejorar su situación económica y acceder así a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is a fourth-year student at the university.  She lives in the southern part of the city of Cochabamba and has a small store that  in order to generate income.  Blanca also works as a nursing assistant where she earns a monthly salary of 400 BOB.  

Blanca needs a loan so that she can increase some of the inventory in her store and generate a larger monthly income.  In addition to managing her store, she also needs to pay for her studies.  She returned to CIDRE in order to obtain a Kiva loan, for which she is grateful.  Blanca would especially like to thank Kiva for providing micro-loans to people in financial need so that the can improve their economic situation and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Gateka Group

texts.fr:
Sifora fait partie du groupe  Gateka  et  habite à Bujumbura. C’est une veuve de   58 ans.
 Elle prend soin  de  4 petits enfants.

Elle fait le commerce des tomates, oignons, manioc,…depuis  40 ans. 

Elle est à son treizième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de tomates, oignons, maniocs, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter un moulin ou une voiture. En plus elle voudrait voir ses petits enfants étudier.
texts.en: Sifora is a member of the Gateka Group and lives in Bujumbura. She is a widow and 58 years old. She takes care of four grandchildren.  She has been in the business of tomatoes, onions, and manioc for 40 years. She is on her 13th loan with Turame.  With this Kiva loan, she will increase her capital and buy a lot of tomatoes, onions, and manioc for resale to earn more.  In the coming years, she would like to buy a mill or a car.  She would also like to see her grandchildren study.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, and manioc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make bench-style tables for his school.

loans.name: Peace Group

texts.en:
Cynthia and Challote are two market women who are selling yams and salt. Both are married and each has 3 children. This is their second loan cycle with Initiative Development-Ghana.  They have been in yam and salt sales for 5 years each. 

Cynthia's husband is a taxi driver and Cynthia is 41 years old. She need this loan because there is high customer demand for yams. Cynthia's profit is 60 Ghana cedis per month.

They need 600 Ghana cedis to be able to buy more yam and salt so that they can serve customers better.

loans.use: To be able to buy more yams and salt to supply to customers.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale, Madame Akouvi est âgée de 28ans et a un 01 enfant de 04ans qui va à l'école. Son activité se fait à domicile et dans une boutique. Elle rencontre comme difficulté la mévente et sollicite l’aide de WAGES par ce second prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut avoir une vie confortable et gérer un gros chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a reseller of general food products. She is 28 years of age and has one child aged 4, who goes to school. She carries out her business from home and in a store.

Akouvi finds it difficult to cope with slumps in sales, and has requested help from WAGES. This is her second loan, which she will use to buy supplies of merchandise. She wants to have a comfortable life and to manage a high level of sales.

loans.use: To buy general food products.

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.es:
La señor jhonny,  es una persona joven trabajador, vive en la provincia mizque del departamento de cochabamba.
Jhonny  se dedica a trabajar en el magisterio de profesor  desde hace cuatro años la escuela donde trabaja  se encuentra alejado de la provincia donde vive el por motivo de trabajo tuvo que vinierse  desde lugares muy alejados. Ahora el  está trabajando en un lugar muy lejano de su de origen y de su familia.    
Jhonny   es muy querido y respetado en el pueblo de mizque, por lo que se dedicado a su  trabajo, el está solicitando el crédito para hacer construir dos habitaciones en un lote que le obsequio su madre  y de esa manera tener una mejor comodidad de vida ya que toda vez tiene problemas en la vivienda donde vive y así  mejorar su condición de vida que lleva.  El crédito ayudara mucho en la comodidad de su vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Jhonny is a hardworking young man. He lives in Mizque Province in Cochabamba Department. He has been a teacher for four years in a school that is located a long distance from the province he resided in. Due to his job he had to come from very remote areas. Now he is working in a place far from his birthplace and his family.

Jhonny is very loved and respected in the town of Mizque because of his dedication to his work. He is requesting a loan to build two rooms on a lot that his mother gave him so that he will be more comfortable since he always has problems in the residence where he lives. Thus he will improve his living situation. The loan will be a big help in making his life more comfortable.

loans.use: Construction materials to build rooms.

loans.name: Kandy Aracely

texts.es: Les presento a la señora Kandy, una mujer emprendedora que tiene como propósito mejorar cada día. Ella tiene 38 años de edad, es separada y tiene 01 hijo aun dependiente. Con los deseos de brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su pequeño hijo Kandy decidió emprender su propio negocio en la venta de productos de belleza, el cual viene realizando hace ya más de 06 años, con dedicación y perseverancia ha podido incrementar su cartera de clientes. Fruto de ello es que ha mejorado su calidad de vida. Más adelante ella piensa implementar un bazar donde pueda exhibir sus productos de belleza. Si bien su negocio principal es la venta de productos de belleza, ella ha solicitado el préstamo con el fin de adquirir una mototaxi para alquilarlo y generar más ingresos para su familia; esto demuestra que Kandy es una mujer muy creativa y luchadora que siempre esta pensando en como mejorar. Kandy se siente feliz al saber muchas personas de todo el mundo la ayudan a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Kandy is an entrepreneur who aims to improve every day.  She is a separated 38 year-old mother of one son whom has been her motivation to succeed.  With the hopes of giving her son a better life Kandy decided to launch her own cosmetic sales business six years ago.  With dedication and perseverance she has been able to increase her market share.  Thanks to her efforts she has been able to better her life and maintain her business. 

In the future she intends to open a store where she can exhibit her products. Although her principal business is selling beauty products, she is seeking a loan to purchase a motorcycle taxi and then rent it out to be able to generate more business for her family.  Kandy feels happy knowing that people around the world are helping her to reach her goals.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
Patience is a 33-year-old trader. She is married with three children, ages 15, 12 and 2 years old. Patience's husband is a carpenter and they have been married for 16 years. She is working hard to help her husband take care of the children. Both she and her husband didn't receive enough formal education. Their children are brilliant and [will] go high with the care taken of them.

Patience is holding some of the commodities that she sells. She sells plastic products and slippers. She buys the items from the main market in Accra. She has been doing this business for 12 years and is in her third loan cycle with ID-Ghana. She will need 200 Ghana cedis to improve sales. She plans to use the profit in support of her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more plastic products and slippers to supply to customers.

loans.name: Nshona Group

texts.en:
Nshona group is made up of Comfort, 56 years old and Anthony, 43 years old.  They live both in Teshie. Both are very good clients because they have been loyal to ID-Ghana since they started taking loans from the micro-finance. 

Comfort operates a cold store where she sells ice; fish, chicken and meat. She has been doing this work for 22 years and she is in her 5th loan cycle.

They need a total of 1,600 Ghana cedis to be able to expand businesses. 900 Ghana cedis for Comfort and 700 Ghana cedis for Anthony.

loans.use: To buy more fish and chicken to be able to increase profit.

loans.name: Elise

texts.fr: Agée de 44 ans, Elise est une veuve et mère de trois enfants scolarisés dans une école de la ville. Elle a une boutique où elle vend des habits et des chaussures dames depuis quelques années puis se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés de la sous région. En vue de satisfaire la demande de ses clients qui augmente sans cesse compte tenu du bon emplacement de sa boutique, elle a sollicité et a bénéficié d'un concours financier auprès de Finadev. Ce concours financier lui permettra de payer les frais d'écolage de ses enfants et les frais du loyer.
texts.en:
Elise is a 44-year-old widow and the mother of three children who go to school in town. She has a shop where she's been selling clothes and women's shoes for a few years. She gets her supplies in a market in her subregion.

Her clientele is ever-increasing thanks to the good location of her shop. In order to meet customer demand, she sought and obtained financial support from Kiva's partner, Finadev. This loan will enable her to pay the rent and her children's school expenses.

loans.use: to buy 38 pieces of clothing and 12 pairs of women's shoes in different qualities

loans.name: Delphine Adjossi

texts.fr: Delphine Adjossi vit chez son mari avec trois enfants à charge qui sont tous scolarisés. Distributrice des boîtes de conserve, des bols, du savon et d'autres articles depuis des années, Delphine Ajossi fait ses approvisionnements dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. Dans le souci de renforcer son activité et de combler les attentes de sa clientèle, Delphine Ajossi a sollicité et a obtenu un appui financier à Finadev. Cet appui financier va lui permettre de participer à la scolarisation et de subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en: Delphine Adjossi lives with her husband and has three children, who attend school, in her care.  She has been a distributer of canned goods, bowls, soap, and other items for several years.  She gets her supplies at one of the markets in Bénin as well as outside the country.   In the hopes of building up her business and to meet the demand of her customers, Delphine Adjossi has requested and received financial help through Finadev.  This loan will allow her to contribute to school expenses and to meet her needs.

loans.use: to buy 2 cases of canned tomatoes, 2 cases of soap, 10 dozen bowls, five dozen plates, and 6 cases of mixed canned goods.

loans.name: Gabiro Group

texts.fr:
Nadia fait partie du groupe Gabiro  et  habite à  Cibitoke .Elle a 21 ans et est mariée à Jackson, vendeur de service de transport par moto. 

Elle fait le commerce de manioc sec depuis  10 mois. 

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  du manioc sec en grande quantité, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter sa propre parcelle.
texts.en:
Nadia is a member of the Gabiro group and lives in Cibitoke. She is 21 years old and married to Jackson, a provider of motorcycle transport services.
She has been selling manioc (cassava) for 10 months. She is on her third loan with Turame. Thanks to this Kiva loan, she will bolster her capital and buy manioc in large quantities in order to earn more from sales. In the years to come, she would like to buy her own land plot.

loans.use: to bolster her capital and buy manioc in large quantities in order to earn more from sales.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina, esta casada y tiene un hijo con el cual vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona 1ro de Mayo de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica  a la costura y confección de ropa de ambos sexos trabajando por más de doce horas al día  y con lo poco que gana debe pagar los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener a su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar tela por cantidad para la confección de trajes y posteriormente venderlos ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Marina es independizarse y dar más comodidad a su familia de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la tercera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Marina is married and has one child. She and her family live at her parents’ house where they occupy only one room. The house is located in the May 1st District in the city of La Paz.

Marina currently generates income by sewing and designing clothes for both sexes. She works more than 12 hours a day. With what little she earns, she is able to pay for expenses such as food and basic services for her family. This is the only source of income that she has by which she is able to sustain her family. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fabrics in quantity for designing outfits that she will sell later. Marina wants to improve her income.

Her dream is to be independent and provide her family with greater comfort so that they can have a better quality of life. This is the third time she has requested a loan from IMPRO, but the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fabrics in bulk for designing outfits for men and women.

loans.name: Candida

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha numa empresa privada como guarda-livros. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, aros, portas e outros) para dar inicio a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja prosseguir com seus estudos e terminar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é manter seu emprego e cuidar da sua saúde para poder conseguir realizar seus projectos.
texts.en: Candida is single and has one son who is now an adult.  She owns the home where she lives and she does not support anyone else.  She works at a private company as a bookkeeper.  She plans to use this loan to purchase construction materials (cement, sand, stones, door frames, doors, etc.) to begin construction on her home.  In the future, she would like to continue her education and complete her house.  She promises to make her loan payments on time in order to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is to keep her job and care for her health so she can successfully complete her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, sand, stones, doorframes, doors, etc.) to begin construction on her home.

loans.name: Leopoldina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa do seu irmão mais velho com seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha numa empresa privada de produção e venda de Banana como empacotadora. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, cimento, areia, pedra e outros) para a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e passara a viver lá com seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a subida de preços de material, doença ou perda de emprego.
texts.en: Leopoldina is single and has three children who attend school.  She lives in her older brother's house with her children and she does not support anyone else.  She works as a packer for a private company that grows and sells bananas.  With this loan she plans to purchase construction materials (beams, cement, sand, stones, etc.) for construction on her house.  In the future she hopes to complete her house and move in with her children. She promises to make her payments on time so she can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenges she faces are the increases in the price of materials, illness, or losing her job.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (beams, cement, sand, stones, etc.) for construction on her home.

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha operário numa empresa privada de produção e venda de Banana. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, aros, janelas, e outros) para a ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir uma motorizada para ajudar na deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldades financeiras e a subida de brusca dos preços do material.
texts.en:
Zacarias is married and has one son who attends school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he does not support anyone else.  

He is a worker in a private company that grows and sells bananas.  With this loan he plans to purchase construction materials (cement, iron, door frames, windows, etc.) to add on to his house.  In the future he would like to finish construction on his home and buy a vehicle to help with transportation to work.  He promises to make his loan payments on time so he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenges he faces are financial difficulties and the sudden increase in the price of materials.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to add on to his house (cement, iron, door frames, windows, etc.)

loans.name: Jossias

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, feijão, arroz, óleo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para o transporte da sua mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en: Jossias is married and has three children who attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he does not support anyone else.  He has his own business selling groceries.  With this loan he will purchase products (peanuts, beans, rice, cooking oil, etc.) to increase his stock of merchandise.  In the future he hopes to complete construction on his home and purchase a vehicle to transport his merchandise.  For this reason he promises to pay his loan on time so that he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is making his loan payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy products for sale (peanuts, beans, rice, cooking oil, etc.) to increase his stock of merchandise.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como agente de serviço no Instituto Agrário de Boane. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, cimento, barrotes, loiça sanitária e outros), para remodelar e ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial para expor o seu produto, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos disponíveis.
texts.en:
Married with four children school attending children, Maria lives in her own home with her family and does not support anyone else.
She works as an agent of the Agrário de Boane Institute. With this loan, she wants to buy construction materials (corrugated iron, cement, beams, and other plumbing materials) to remodel and extend her home. 
In the future, she wants to build a business to sell her own products. She is committed to repay the loan due, in order to request a future loan with Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (corrugated iron, cement, beams, and other plumbing materials) to remodel and extend her home.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.pt:
Casado e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar bens de consumo (cadeiras, sofás, estante, e outros), para mobilar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja aumentar o seu nível de escolaridade e crescer profissionalmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a grande distância que percorre do local de trabalho ate a faculdade.
texts.en: Faustino is married and the father of two school-aged children. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. He works as a teacher and is on the Ministry of Education's staff. He will use this loan to purchase furniture (chairs, sofas, bookshelves, etc.) for his home. In the future he hopes to continue his studies and grow professionally. He is committed to paying off his loan so that he can request further loans from Hluvuku. The greatest challenge he faces is the long distance he must travel between work and school.

loans.use: to purchase furniture (chairs, sofas, bookshelves, etc.) for his home.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas alimentares.
Tem um negocio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, pregos, ferro, e outros), para aplicar na cobertura da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja adquirir uma camioneta para transportar a sua mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o empenho no seu negócio para garantir o bem-estar da sua família.
texts.en: Isaias is married and the father of five children, three of whom are still in school. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his mother, sending money to help her pay for food. He has a business selling staple goods. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (sheet metal, beams, nails, iron, etc.) to use on the siding of his house. In the future he hopes to acquire a truck to transport his merchandise. He is committed to paying off his loan so that he can request further loans from Hluvuku. The greatest challenge he faces is the hard work he puts into his business to ensure his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sheet metal, beams, nails, iron, etc.) to use on the siding of his house.

loans.name: Flavio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (portas, chapas de zinco, barrotes, cimento, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e dar continuidade aos seus estudos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade de transporte ao local de trabalho.
texts.en: Flavio is married and the father of three school-aged children. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. He works as a teacher and is on the Ministry of Education's staff. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (doors, sheet metal, beams, cement, etc.) to continue building his house. In the future he hopes to finish building his house and continue his studies, and he is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. The greatest challenge he faces is getting to work every day.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (doors, sheet metal, beams, cement, etc.) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, sand, rocks, bricks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Laurencia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 2 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, pedra e o pagamento da mão de obra), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e construir dependências para os filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para transportar a sua família e garantir a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, two of whom still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She owns her own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks) and to pay for labor, so she can continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building her house and to build additional rooms for her children. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is buying a vehicle for her family's transportation, and ensuring her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, stone) and to pay for labor, so she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, toilets, a bathtub, tiles, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Azelia

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com seus filhos e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
Trabalha numa empresa privada de produção e venda de Banana como empacotadora. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas de zinco, aros, pregos, e outros) para a cobertura da obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e passara a viver lá com seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a subida de preços de material, insuficiência de fundos ou perda de emprego.
texts.en:
Azelia is married and has three school-aged children. She lives in her own home with her children and also supports two nephews who live with her. 
She works as a baler for a private banana company. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (beams, sheet metal, nails, etc.) to use for building her house. 
In the future she hopes to finish building the house and move into it with her children. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. 
Her greatest challenges are the rising cost of building materials, lack of money, and job loss.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (beams, sheet metal, nails, etc.) to use for building her house

loans.name: Juliao

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha como motorista na ARA – SUL. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, portas, aros, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e abrir um negócio para ajudar na renda familiar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldades financeiras e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports two nephews who live with him.
He works as a driver for ARA-Sul (the Mozambican Southern Regional Water Administration). With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to start a business in order to help with his family's income. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is financial hardships and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Jeremias

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, feijão, arroz, óleo, caldo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e o seu estabelecimento para diversificar mais os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é desenvolver mais o negócio e concluir o curso superior.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan he intends to purchase goods (peanuts, beans, rice, olive oil, broth, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to enlarge his home and his store, so that he can further diversify his merchandise. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is developing his business and finishing his higher studies.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (peanuts, beans, rice, olive oil, broth, etc.).

loans.name: Lucia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, capulanas, óleo, farinha de milho, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja reabilitar a sua casa para melhor confortar os seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o volume do seu negócio e a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's single and has four children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs his own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, shawls, olive oil, corn flour, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to rehabilitate her home, so that her children will have more comfort. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is her children's education and increasing her turnover.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, shawls, olive oil, corn flour, etc.).

loans.name: Julia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 10 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de material de construção. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, barrotes, pedra, e outros), para reabastecer o seu Estaleiro. 
No futuro deseja reformar pois a idade já não permite fazer muito esforço, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é manter-se saudável para apoiar os seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's married and has ten children, all of them adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs her own business selling construction supplies. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, beams, rocks, etc.) in order to stock up her storage yard.
In the future she wishes to retire, because her age no longer allows her to do hard work. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is keeping herself healthy, so that she can support her children.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, beams, rocks, etc.) in order to stock up her storage yard.

loans.name: Luis

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, massa, amendoim, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar o seu nível do seu negócio e construir um estabelecimento maior, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e o bem-estar da sua família.
texts.en:
He's married and has five children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan he intends to purchase goods (rice, flour, pasta, peanuts, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to upgrade his business and build a larger store. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan as scheduled and his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, flour, pasta, peanuts, etc.).

loans.name: Charie

texts.en: Charie is a woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married with one child. She and her husband are engaged in a fishing business for quite some time now. Charie would like to make sure that the boat that they are using for fishing is always functional. She is asking for a loan to pay for boat engine maintenance so she can have their boat engine checked and repaired. She will continue to help her husband by selling his catch in her neighborhood for a profit. The income that she will generate will provide her family a healthy diet, reinvestment in the same business and savings for her one year old baby. In the future, she hopes to have other business options so she can make her family's life better and comfortable.

loans.use: to pay for boat engine maintenance

loans.name: Imigisha Group

texts.fr:
Calenie fait partie du groupe Imigisha et  habite à Gitega .Elle a 40 ans et est mariée à Roger, commerçant de vaches. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants dont  4 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de  vaches  depuis 15ans. 

Elle est à son dixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de vaches à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Avec le gain du commerce, elle assure la ration alimentaire,  les soins de santé de la famille  et paie les frais de scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Calenie is a member of the Imigisha group and lives in Gitega. She is 40 years-old and is married to Roger, a cow seller. Together they have six children, four of them attend school.

She has been selling cows for the last 15 years.

This is her tenth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan she will get, she will increase her working capital to buy a lot of cows for resell in order to earn more.

With the profit from her business, she provides for the food, the health needs of her family and pays for the schooling fees.

loans.use: increase her working capital and buy a lot of cows for resell to earn more.

loans.name: Julio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de corte e costura e venda de roupa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos para fabricar roupas e aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e melhorar ainda mais a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a grande concorrência no mercado das roupas.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business dressmaking and selling clothing. With this loan he intends to purchase fabric for making clothes, in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to enlarge his home and improve it even more. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is how competitive the clothing market is.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for making clothes.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, areia, pedra, barrotes, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra dE depósito de água e um aviário. 
No futuro deseja concluir as suas obras e construir uma barraca para aumentar a sua renda familiar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e a insuficiência de fundos para cobrir os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Rosalinda is married with five children, two of whom attend school. She lives in her own home with her family and does not support anyone else.  She has a business raising and selling chickens.  With this loan, she wants to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone, beams etc.) to continue the construction of a water tank and an aviary [chicken coup]. 
In the future, she wants to complete this construction project as well as to build a shopfront to increase her family income. She is committed to repaying the loan due in order to request further loans with Hluvuku.  
Her challenges are to repay the current loan and request sufficient funds to cover future projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone, beams etc.) to continue the construction of a water tank and an aviary.

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe mais um neto e um sobrinho que vivem com ela.
Tem um negócio próprio de fabrico e venda de roupas diversas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos, zipes, linhas, botões, e outros, para aumentar e diversificar a quantidade de roupa na sua boutique. 
No futuro deseja construir uma mercearia para reformar no trabalho de costura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a grande concorrência que acaba dificultando o sucesso do seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children, all of them adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her mother, a grandson and a nephew who live with her.
She runs his own business making and selling various clothes. With this loan she intends to purchase fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc., in order to stock up and diversify the garments in her shop.
In the future she wishes to build a grocery store, so she can retire from her dressmaking work. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the high competition, which ends up making it harder for her business to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc., in order to stock up and diversify the garments in her shop.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando dinheiro para auxiliar nas despesas alimentares.
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, pedra, chapas de Zinco, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para a sua deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade financeira e a garantia da formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his parents by sending them money to help with food expenses.
He's a serviceman and a staffer of the Ministry of Defense. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to purchase a vehicle for commuting to work. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is financial hardships and ensuring his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (portas, cimento, chapas de Zinco, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para a sua deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a serviceman and a staffer of the Ministry of Defense. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (doors, cement, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to purchase a vehicle for commuting to work. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan according to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (doors, cement, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É agricultor e dono do próprio negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar adubos, pesticidas, combustível e outros, para aplicar na sua machamba. 
No futuro deseja aumentar mais Hectares de cultivo e melhorar o seu nível de produção, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a farmer and runs his own business. With this loan he intends to purchase fertilizer, pesticide, fuel, etc., to use on his farm.
In the future he wishes to expand his farm with more hectares. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is working harder in order to increase his profits.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, pesticide, fuel, etc., to use on his farm.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É pensionista da Ara-Sul. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, areia, e outros), para construir uma fossa na sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a fossa para melhorar as condições de saneamento da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos disponíveis.
texts.en:
He's married and has eight children, all of them adults. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a pensioner of ARA-Sul (the Mozambican Southern Regional Water Administration). With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, sand, etc.) in order to build a septic tank for his home.
In the future he wishes to finish building the septic tank in order to improve his family's sanitation conditions. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is not having enough funds available.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, sand, etc.) in order to build a septic tank for his home.

loans.name: Yawo

texts.fr: Agé de 36ans et père de 02 enfants (07 et 03ans) dont 01 scolarisé, Mr Yawo est marié à une femme qui exerce la même profession que lui c’est – à dire le commerce. Il est dans ce domaine il y a un moment et son activité s’est beaucoup plus penchée sur la vente de graviers. Il le fait juste au bord de la route. Son premier crédit qu’il sollicite dans notre institution lui servira à s’acheter du gravier pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Son souhait est de s’acheter un camion pour le transport du gravier et rendre sa famille heureuse.
texts.en: Mr Yawo is 36 years old and father to 02 children (07 and 03 years old) one of whom is in school. He and his wife are both traders by profession. He has been a trader for some time and his main activity is selling gravel. He does this on the roadside. He is seeking his first loan from our microfinance institution in order to buy gravel to better meet customer needs. He would like to buy a truck to transport gravel and make his family happy.

loans.use: to buy gravel

loans.name: Abidé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentations générales et des céréales dans une boutique depuis 2010, Madame Abidé est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charges. Ses produits sont vendus à toutes personnes et elle est aidée par une personne. Vu que ses clients augmentent de jour en jour, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut injecter le profit dans d’autres activités secondaires (vente de produits congelés). Elle veut plus tard se lancer dans la vie maritale et aider sa sœur à apprendre un métier.
texts.en: Madame Abidé has been a retailer of general food supplies and cereals from her store since 2010. She is single and has no children in her care. She sells her products to all kinds of customers and is assisted by one person. Because her customers are increasing day by day, she is requesting her first loan from the microfinance institution WAGES in order to get more supplies. She wants to inject any profits into other secondary activities (sales of frozen products). Later she wants get married and help her sister learn a trade.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Agée de 42ans, madame Abra est mère de 01 enfant de 05ans qui va à l’école. Pour mieux  assurer la scolarité de son seul enfant et se prendre aussi en charge, elle vend depuis 02ans des habits et chaussures (liquidation) de façon ambulante à toute personne.  Sa difficulté est la mévente par moment. En cette période de vacances, elle désire stocker plus de marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients c’est pour cela, elle sollicite dans notre institution un premier prêt pour son approvisionnement. Dans l’avenir, elle voudrait agrandir l’activité par l’ouverture d’une boutique.
texts.en: Madame Abra is 42 years old and is mother to 01 child who is 05 years old and goes to school. To better ensure the education of her only child and take care of him, she has been working as a street-trader selling clothes and shoes for 02 years (clearance stock) to all kinds of customers. Her main difficulty is slow sales at times. In this holiday season, she wants to increase her stock to better meet customer needs. This is why she is seeking her first loan from our microfinance institution in order to buy supplies. In the future she would like to expand her business by opening a store.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes

loans.name: Kéméabalo

texts.fr: Mr Kéméabalo est propriétaire d’un cafétariat depuis 2011. Il vend de la nourriture et des boissons à toutes personnes et est aidé par 01 personne. Il sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter un congélateur, des produits alimentaires et de la boisson. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, l’agrandir et dans l’avenir fonder un foyer car il est célibataire.
texts.en: Mr. Kéméabalo has owned an eatery since 2011.  He sells food and drinks to the general public and has one assistant.  He is requesting his first loan through WAGES to buy a freezer, food products, and drinks.  He would like to reinvest in his business, increase its size, and, in the future, start a family since he is single.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and food products for his eatery.

loans.name: Badegdg

texts.fr: Revendeur de céréales depuis 2009 à toutes personnes à domicile, Mr Badegdg est âgé de 37ans et marié à une revendeuse. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les villes voisines de Lomé. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients et avoir plus de bénéfices, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un troisième crédit afin d' acheter des sacs de céréales. Il veut renforcer l’activité et ajouter d’autres activités complémentaires. Avec les bénéfices, il veut assurer l’éducation de ses futurs progénitures.
texts.en: Mr. Badegdg has been selling cereals to the public at large since 2009. He is 37 years old. His wife is a vendor. He stocks up in Lomé and in the nearby towns. In order to better meet customer demand and increase his revenues, he is seeking a third loan from WAGES intended for the purchase of some bags of cereals. He would like to bolster his business and add some secondary activities. He would like to earn enough to be able to provide for the education of his future children one day.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: Couturière de profession et cela depuis 1990 dans un atelier, Madame Akouavi est mère de 01 enfant âgé de 12ans qui va à l'école.  Elle même est âgée de 46ans. Elle sollicite dans notre institution un premier crédit pour s'approvisionner de la machine à coudre et aménager son atelier. Elle veut renforcer son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Akouavi has been a seamstress in a workshop since 1990. She is the mother of a 12 year-old child who attends school.  She is 46 years old.

She is requesting a first loan from our organization to buy a sewing machine and outfit her workshop. She wants to strengthen her business and foster the development of her family.

loans.use: outfit her workshop and buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Apélété

texts.fr: Père d'01enfant âgé de 03ans, Mr Apélété est marié à une revendeuse. Il est aussi revendeur mais lui s’est beaucoup plus penché sur la vente des produits chimiques. Il exerce seul l’activité au marché et sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le terrain. Pour garder ses clients, mieux satisfaire leurs demandes, il sollicite de WAGES un prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises (produits chimiques). Il voudrait être grossiste des produits chimiques à son lieu d’activité et assurer le bien – être de la famille. Il est âgé de 39ans.
texts.en:
Apélété is the father of a 3-year-old child, and is married to a reseller. He also works as a reseller, but is much more involved in the sale of chemical products. He runs his business alone in the market, and the difficulty he faces is competition in his area. 

To keep his customers and better meet their needs, Apélété has requested a loan from WAGES to buy supplies (chemical products). He would like to be a chemical product wholesaler in the area where his business is located, and would also like to ensure his family’s wellbeing. He is 39 years of age.

loans.use: To buy chemical products.

loans.name: Koméssé

texts.fr: Agé de 34ans et marié à une revendeuse de bijoux Mr Koméssé est revendeur de cartes de recharges depuis 2009 de façon ambulante. Il s’approvisionne dans les sociétés de téléphonie et sollicite ce troisième prêt pour s’acheter des cartes de recharges afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité  et prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Koméssé is married to jewelry seller. He has been selling mobile phone recharge cards door-to-door since 2009. He gets his supplies from the phone companies.
He is requesting this third loan to buy mobile phone recharge cards to better meet his customers’ needs. He wants to reinvest in his activity and take care of his family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards.

loans.name: Tsomado

texts.fr: Tôlier –soudeur de profession depuis 1986, Mr Tsomado âgé de 53ans est marié à une revendeuse et père de 06 enfants dont 04 sur les bancs d’école. Le premier est âgé de 30ans et le dernier 04ans. Son activité se fait dans un garage et il a de nombreux clients qui sollicitent son travail à cause de  sa perfection. Il sollicite de notre institution un premier prêt pour acheter des outils de travail et faire des prestations de services a ses derniers. Il veut avec les profits supplémentaires, investir une partie et épargner le reste. A l’avenir, il veut investir la vente des pièces de tôleries à la soudure et assurer le bien –être de la famille.
texts.en: A sheet metal worker and welder since 1986, Tsomado is a 53-year-old man married to a retailer and the father of six children. Four of the children are in school. The oldest of his children is 30 years old and the youngest is four years old. His business is in a garage, and he has many clients who request his work due to its perfection. He is asking the microfinance institution for his first loan to purchase tools so he can provide services to his clients. He would like to invest a portion of his additional profit and save the rest. In the future, he would like to invest in selling pieces of sheet metal for welding, and ensure the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy tools so he can provide services for his clients.

loans.name: Edem

texts.fr: Agé de 32ans, Mr Edem est un jeune homme célibataire qui vend des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2011. Il exerce seul cette activité et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Pour mieux satisfaire les clients, il sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour s’acheter des produits d'alimentation générale. Il veut dans l’avenir renforcer son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de sa future famille.
texts.en:
Edem is a young, single man aged 32, who has worked selling general food products in a store since 2011. He runs this business alone, and gets his supplies in Lomé. 

To better meet his customers’ needs, Edem has requested his first loan from WAGES, which he will use to buy general food products. In the future he would like to strengthen his business, as well as to ensure that the family he plans to have in the future gets ahead.

loans.use: To buy general food products.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de pagnes, d’articles de mercerie et des biscuits depuis 1991 dans une boutique, Madame Afi est mariée à un électrotechnicien et est âgée de 40ans. Elle est maman de 02 enfants qui sont sur les bancs d'école. Elle est couturière de profession et pour pouvoir joindre les deux bouts, elle a ajouté le commerce qui lui procure le minimum. Elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour s’approvisionner en pagnes, en produits de mercerie et en biscuits. Avec le profit qu’elle réalisera, elle veut accroitre son activité et permettre à sa famille de bien s’épanouir.
texts.en: A boutique retailer of pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies since 1991, Afi is a 40-year-old woman married to an electrician. She is the mother of two children who are in school. She is a seamstress by profession and to make ends meet, she has added retailing to her business, which provides her with the minimum essentials. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy supplies of pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies. With the profit she makes, she would like to grow her business and let her family thrive.

loans.use: to buy pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies.

loans.name: Rafiétou

texts.fr: Femme d’un policier et mère de 02 enfants tous scolarisés, madame Rafiétou âgée de 34ans est revendeuse des produits de détails notamment sucre, miel, maïs, et des galettes sous un hangar. Elle s’approvisionne au Grand marché de Lomé et 02 personnes lui prêtent main forte pour l’avancement de son activité. Elle est à son premier crédit de WAGES et ce prêt lui permettra de s’approvisionner en marchandises (sucre, miel, mais et des matières premières (farine de blé, de l’huile) pour faire des galettes). Dans l’avenir, elle veut agrandir l’activité et bien éduquer ses enfants.
texts.en: Married to a police officer and mother of two school-aged children, Rafiétou is a 34-year-old retailer of products including sugar, honey, corn and pancakes. She sells her goods out of a warehouse. She gets her supplies at the Grand Market of Lomé, and two people lend her a hand to help her advance her business. This is her first loan from WAGES and it will allow her to stock up on goods and supplies (sugar, honey, corn, and raw ingredients such as flour and oil to make pancakes.) In the future, she would like to grow her business and educate her children well.

loans.use: to buy sugar, honey, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Pouaneoé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale et cela depuis 2005 à domicile,  madame Pouaneoé est mariée à un commerçant et ils ont en charge 03 enfants qui ont 17, 12 et 05ans. Les enfants vont tous à l’école.
